name: updateNetworkFirmwareUpgrades
description: Update firmware upgrade information for a network

products.description: Contains information about the network to update

appliance.description: The network device to be updated

nextUpgrade.description: The pending firmware upgrade if it exists

time.description: The time of the last successful upgrade

toVersion.description: The version to be updated to

participateInNextBetaRelease.description: Whether or not the network wants beta firmware
